title: Alterations in the fillet quality of myostatin-knockout red sea bream Pagrus major: Preliminary insights into nutritional, compositional, and textural properties
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Yu Murakami, Masashi Ando, Kenta Kishimoto, Mitsuki Ohama, Yuto Uemura, Reoto Tani, Atsushi Akazawa, Kentaro Matsumiya, Kenji Sato, Masato Kinoshita
